DOC.brief_summary: Women access website , age 38-45 year consider screen mammogram randomize either Decision Aid ( booklet provide information exercise help make decision whether screen mammogram ) group Control Group . The Decision Aid group first read decision aid , ask demographic knowledge question . The control group ask demographic knowledge question . The control group access Decision Aid complete question
DOC.brief_title: Australian Screening Mammography Decision Aid Trial : A Decision Aid Women Aged 40 Thinking About Starting Mammography Screening
